message.body: Hahaha you are the cutest. I'll check it out.
Asap. I'm in class still and don't get out for a while
That's awesome!
I could also do tonight
Me too!
That is awesome!
Wait are ppl free now to Skype?
Boo
Fair enough I also forgot what time it's there on a Friday
Wait is there really no honor code?
It failed. We are having a special plenary.
It failed because we were 5 votes over 2/3 quorum and 2/3 of the student body needs to vote yes but 63 or something people voted no
Oh wow
Yeah. And quorum at special plenary is either 2/3 or 3/4...it will likely be a shitshow but apparently this has happened a decent number of times
I think it's 3/4 yeah it happened when seniors when I was a freshman were seniors so like 8 yrs ago
06 yeah
And 2000
Yeah. Sounds like fun times. When is special plenary happening
No idea
That is crazy
Yep. People are talking a lot, which is good. But it's probably the people who voted in the first place that are talking.
Yeah I bet. I wonder why people were opposed
The honor council cochair said at plenary he was voting against it because its not working. I think he was basing that on the increase in cheating/plagiarism trials.
Wow. Which I understand that ha been the issue the past few years. Who is the cochair this year
Ok
Will Bannard said it. Tamar is the other one
I couldn't hear well. There was a big discussion and he was like just think about it before you vote yes. And there are always people who want to force a special plenary.
That is very true. How are the deans and faculty dealing with it?
Yea I definitely remember that
(Factors that explain the no votes)
No clue - we haven't had a weekday yet
When was plenary?
Last Sunday but ratification closed last night at midnight
Oh okay
Also because we got quorum we don't have to petition for a special plenary, it just happens
Yeah that's good
Awesome. Yes!
You are ridiculous. I love you have fun
